gsml:GeologicVocabulary.gml:description: A vocabulary of standard material types which may be identified by the URN "urn:x-cgi:lex:material:BGS:2005:matLex1"
gsml:GeologicVocabulary.gml:name: urn:x-cgi:lex:material:BGS:2005:matLex1

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: This is an entry from a vocabulary of standard types denoting the concept whose common name is "mud" which may be identified by the URN "urn:x-cgi:def:material:BGS:2005:matLex1:mud"
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:x-cgi:def:material:BGS:2005:matLex1:mud

gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:description: This is an entry from a vocabulary of standard types denoting the concept whose common name is "sand" which may be identified by the URN "urn:x-cgi:def:material:BGS:2005:matLex1:sand"
gsml:ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:x-cgi:def:material:BGS:2005:matLex1:sand
